title: Motorola Moto G Stylus (2022) launched, packing average specs at an average price
content:
Motorola has a ton of devices for all different kinds of price ranges, and one of the company’s more unique offerings is its G Stylus line of smartphones. These tend to be more middle-of-the-road smartphones with average specifications and a reasonable price, with the added addition of a Samsung-style stylus that can dock inside of

The post Motorola Moto G Stylus (2022) launched, packing average specs at an average price appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Motorola Moto G Stylus (2022) has just launched, and it packs average specs like a MediaTek G88 at an average price. Check it out here!
